kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent: Like Sean mentioned, this is most likely related to the improved 'read-only' mode added to the Page Builder, which displays the Admin UI for widgets and sections on pages in non-edit mode. To fix this, make sure the Page Builder styles are correctly rendered within that context in your layout file. At least this was my issue. ![](https://assets-us-01.kc-usercontent.com/2548121d-cad8-4458-a910-5e4b54cb0956/e54d82ca-aace-4d4e-be0d-fe6fcebbcb26/iScreen%20Shoter%20-%20Code%20-%20241001123842.png)
